issue.title: Rendering errors when running headless on remote machine

content.raw: Reopening until I can complete a test running docker-compose on all the images required to run subt_solution. Waiting on some updates from our IT guy. I did get a workaround by rebuilding the cloudsim_sim docker with xvfb and changing the run_sim.bash file, but have not gotten an end-to-end test with the bridge and subt_solution to work yet.
content.html: Reopening until I can complete a test running docker-compose on all the images required to run subt_solution. Waiting on some updates from our IT guy. I did get a workaround by rebuilding the cloudsim_sim docker with xvfb and changing the run_sim.bash file, but have not gotten an end-to-end test with the bridge and subt_solution to work yet.
